creator: larsga@garshol.priv.no
text: When asked with getFeature() Crimson admits that it supports EXTERNAL_GENERAL and EXTERNAL_PARAMETER. However, when one tries to set these Crimson invariably says they are not supported. It should only do this if one tries to turn them off, which is not supported.
